name: Full day photoshoot
description:
To make full use of your time, why not go for a full day's shoot, working in and around the studio or at a location of your choice? This shoot is ideal if there is a group of you wanting to shoot several outfits, for bands working on a full album of images or for models looking to shoot a range of portfolio images.
Feel free to do your own hair and make-up, bing along a friend to help, hire a stylist, or ask about one of our hair and makeup collaborators (additional fee applies).
Price includes online planning assistance, full use of Shutterworks Studio in Central Southampton and up to 20 fully-edited images. Additional edits cost £10 each, plus prints are available at £5 for A4 size.
If this sounds like your kind of shoot, drop us a line and we can get planning!

name: One-hour Headshot Photoshoot
description:
Choose a backdrop colour to suit your requirements, spend a little time pampering yourself either at home or here, and Scott will direct you to help get the best from your photoshoot which will last around 1 hour. Price includes editing time for up to four images (prints may be purchase from just £5 for A4) and you can pay for additional edits as you wish at £10 each. Evenings and weekends only, either in our studio or we can come to you for additional travel expenses (ask about space requirements). 
Cancellation charges: 
Cancellation more than 1 week prior to shoot date - Forfeit deposit 
Cancellation within a week of shoot date - 50% of total shoot cost
Cancellation within 24 hours of shoot date - 100% of total shoot cost

name: Half-day portrait/burlesque/band shoot
description:
A half day both in the studio or out and about on location (or both!)  with outfit changes galore, various backdrops and props, plus the standard 12 edited images. This gives you the flexibility and opportunity to really relax into the shoot and get the most from your session. 
Price includes editing time for up to 12 images (prints may be purchased from just £5 for A4 size) and you can pay for additional edits as you wish (£10 per image). Feel free to bring your own make-up artist (or do your own) or ask about one of our hair and make-up collaborators (additional fee applies). 
Weekends only. Can travel to you for additional travel expenses, or you can come to our studio in Southampton, just a short walk from the Train Station. 
Cancellation charges: 
Cancellation more than 1 week prior to shoot date - Forfeit deposit 
Cancellation within a week of shoot date - 50% of total shoot cost
Cancellation within 24 hours of shoot date - 100% of total shoot cost

name: One hour shoot with print package
description:
Want a photoshoot but worry about the after costs associated with purchasing prints? Why not go for our special shoot and print package. Any style shoot you like with one backdrop (or can be on location) for one hour, after which you can select from your best images those which you would like edited and printed. 
Print package includes 
1 12" x 16" print
2   8" x 10" prints
4   5" x   7" prints
Additional prints available at very reasonable prices.
Cancellation charges: 
Cancellation more than 1 week prior to shoot date - Forfeit deposit 
Cancellation within a week of shoot date - 50% of total shoot cost
Cancellation within 24 hours of shoot date - 100% of total shoot cost

name: Prints
description: If you would like a print of any of Scott Chalmers Photography's work, please select the print size below and be sure to state which image you would like. P&P applies to all prints.
